title.rendered: 24Fashion TV to be a media sponsor for NOW PR’s “Party and Shop” with top influencers

content.rendered:
24FASHION TV is excited to be a media sponsor for NOW PR 's event - launch of the new fall collection LennyLu and designer Puey Quiones

This fall collection is set to launch on September 23rd with a party at SIXTY Beverly Hills that will be filled with the biggest celebrity "It Girls". It will be an exclusive factory direct order only collection with the collaboration of celebrity influencers Roz, Bela Padilla, Antje Utgaard, and Lauren Blake. Those invited will be able to browse through the collection and purchase their own exclusive pair of luxury shoes.
